channel.title: Manual on Hugo Bootstrap
channel.description: Recent content in Manual on Hugo Bootstrap
channel.copyright: Copyright Â© 2016-{year} Razon Yang. All Rights Reserved.

item.title: Aligning Images
item.description: We can easily align images by adding URL fragments. Such as #center, #floatleft and #floatright represents align center, float left and float right respectively.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Alert Shortcode
item.description: This article shows how to use the alert shortcode.

item.title: Media Shortcodes
item.description: A detailed description of media shortcodes, such as Bilibili, Tencent, Youku, iQiyi and Netease Music.

item.title: Online IDE Shortcodes
item.description: A detailed description of online IDE shortcodes, such as JSFiddle, CodePen, JSRun.
